name: Truffle-Infused Sea Salt Almonds
description: Elevate your snacking experience with our Truffle-Infused Sea Salt Almonds. Hand-selected California almonds are delicately roasted and tossed with a blend of natural sea salt and decadent truffle essence, creating an irresistible savory treat. Perfect for entertaining guests or indulging on your own, these premium nuts offer a harmonious balance of crunch and umami flavor. Enjoy them as a sophisticated party snack, a luxurious addition to cheese boards, or a gourmet topping for salads and pasta.
